Testimonial.name: Damon Raffels
Testimonial.quote: Khwezi is one of the most calm and collected people you will ever have the joy of meeting and working with. He has a strong will to learn and further his abilities as a developer, is always a pleasure to be around and will be an asset to any workforce.

Testimonial.name: Muhammad Rajah
Testimonial.quote: Khwezi is an absolute legend. He doesn't know it yet, but he has the potential to cement his legacy in the world of programming.

Testimonial.name: Matthew Brown
Testimonial.quote: Khwezi continually goes above and beyond in whatever he does. His devotion and work ethic make him an valuable team player. Khwezi's analytical skills have been greatly proven. His positive attitude makes him a joy to work with.

Testimonial.name: Corn√© Balie
Testimonial.quote: Khwezi is very resourceful and has always been happy to lend a hand when helping others. He is definitely one of the most reliable classmates I've had and never disappoints in his ability to deliver work.

Testimonial.name: Warren Jafta
Testimonial.quote: in my short time of knowing Khwezilomso i have found him to be a very intelligent programmer who always thinks outside of the box.

Testimonial.name: Matthew Swain
Testimonial.quote: Khwezi is an outstanding individual, whether it be his work or him as a person. Always pleasant to work with, always promotes positivity, has unmatched enthusiasm and his determination and drive is out of this world.
